articles.title: Video: SpiceJet Plane To Delhi Catches Fire, Emergency Landing In Patna
articles.description: A Delhi-bound Spicejet aircraft, carrying 185 passengers, landed safely back in Patna right after take-off as its left engine had caught fire following a bird hit, officials have said.
articles.content:
